parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.72

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Custom Panels

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Returns array of all components available to given object info panel.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> unit [[infoPanelComponents]] panelID

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - the concerned vehicle

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> panelID: [[String]] - "left" or "right" can be used as panel names

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Array]] - format [className, componentType, isAccessible]:
* className: [[String]] - component classname as defined in object/vehicle config
* componentType: [[String]] - componentType - component type
* isAccessible: [[Boolean]] - boolean flag that shows if component is currently accessible (lack of required item can make it temporarily inaccessible)

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [unit, turretPath] [[infoPanelComponents]] panelID

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - the concerned vehicle

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> turretPath: [[Array]] - turret index

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> panelID: [[String]] - "left" or "right" can be used as panel names

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]] - format [className, componentType, isAccessible]:
* className: [[String]] - component classname as defined in object/vehicle config
* componentType: [[String]] - componentType - component type
* isAccessible: [[Boolean]] - boolean flag that shows if component is currently accessible (lack of required item can make it temporarily inaccessible)

</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code><template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>returns array of all components configured for _helicopter pilot seat</value></part></template>
_componentsData = [_helicopter, [-1]] [[infoPanelComponents]] "left";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Arma 3 Custom Info]], [[infoPanel]], [[infoPanels]], [[setInfoPanel]], [[enableInfoPanelComponent]], [[infoPanelComponentEnabled]]
</value></part></template></root>
